entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
